thought: To craft a spruce_boat, I first need to craft spruce_planks. Spruce_planks can be crafted using spruce_wood, which I have at slot 14. Therefore, I will move the spruce_wood into the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: Now that I have crafted the spruce_planks, I need to move them out of the crafting grid and into the inventory. I will move them to slot 12 since it is empty.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

thought: To craft a spruce boat, I need to first craft 5 spruce planks. I have 4 spruce planks in my inventory but need 1 more, so I will move a spruce wood to the crafting table and craft 4 more spruce planks.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 4
